content.value: Save 15% when you purchase an Organic Luxe Percale Sheet Set with your Organic Luxe Waffle Duvet Set

Our beautifully textured waffle duvet cover set is woven from super soft 100% organic cotton. Lightweight and breathable, it features a traditional honeycomb design on the front and a classic 400 thread count percale on the reverse side. Handcrafted for aesthetic ease and touchable comfort.
Organic cotton is made without harmful toxins like pesticides or insecticides, making it safer for the farmers who harvest it, the consumers who use it, and the environment.
100% organic waffle weave cotton; reverses to solid 400TC 100% organic cotton percale
Set includes duvet cover and two shams; twin and full / queen waffle duvet cover sets include standard size shams; king/cal king duvet set includes king size shams
Duvet cover includes button closure and corner ties to hold the comforter in place; envelope closure on shams
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Crafted in Tiruppur, India
Machine wash cool using mild laundry detergent. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.

productDetails.productDetails:
• 100% organic waffle weave cotton; reverses to solid 400TC 100% organic cotton percale
  • Set includes duvet cover and two shams; twin and full / queen waffle duvet cover sets include standard size shams; king/cal king duvet set includes king size shams
  • Duvet cover includes button closure and corner ties to hold the comforter in place; envelope closure on shams
  • Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
  • Crafted in Tiruppur, India

productDescription.productDescription:
Our beautifully textured waffle duvet cover set is woven from super soft 100% organic cotton. Lightweight and breathable, it features a traditional honeycomb design on the front and a classic 400 thread count percale on the reverse side. Handcrafted for aesthetic ease and touchable comfort.


Organic cotton is made without harmful toxins like pesticides or insecticides, making it safer for the farmers who harvest it, the consumers who use it, and the environment.
